solution_line_template: If Grant is currently {grant_current_age} years old, he will be {grant_current_age}+{years_in_future} = <<{grant_current_age}+{years_in_future}={grant_age_in_five_years}>>{grant_age_in_five_years} years old in five years.

If {grant_age_fraction} represents Grant's age in five years, then the fraction representing the number of years the hospital is older than Grant is {whole_fraction}-{grant_age_fraction} = {difference_fraction}

If {grant_age_fraction} represents {grant_age_in_five_years} years, {hospital_age_fraction}, which is the fraction representing the age of the hospital, represents {hospital_age_fraction}*{grant_age_in_five_years}*{reciprocal_grant_age_fraction} = {hospital_age_in_five_years} years.
Currently, the hospital is {hospital_age_in_five_years}-{years_in_future} = <<{hospital_age_in_five_years}-{years_in_future}={hospital_current_age}>>{hospital_current_age} years old.
